title: Diana's early jungle clear.
body:
I find it weird that a champion that relies a lot on auto-attacks actually has one of the lowest base attack speed in the game. Her early clear feels soooo slow. Add on that the fact that her ganks are really bad pre-6.

While i know her midlaning is fine, her winrate is much lower in the jungle. I feel like she could use an attack speed buff to ease her clear.

Also is it even worth to complete {{item:1402}}? I feel like rushing a {{item:3115}} after getting {{item:3706}} offers much better clear and scaling.

replies.body: Diana neess to be unplayable in all roles and then reworked into something slightly less overbearing.
yeah she isnt viable in jungle
I like the clear that lich bane gives her :D I play her mid though lol {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

Shes a mid laner and she does not rely on her AAs to deal damage. Instead, her spell is what buffs her AA for short period of time. Giving her more AA speed would not change anything at all. But yes, I would like to see some serious Diana jungle buffs because shes really fun to play.
Revert Diana and give back the as % bonus on her passive (permanently)
